dataList.dlg:
Aah... Could it... You're...
My Sinclair...?

All my fault, you say...? What fault?
I daresay it's all thanks to me.

dataList.desc: 말풍선 특수 대사_에드가 가문 치프 버틀러 료슈
dataList.dlg:
S.A.D.
You're a failure of a Chief Butler.
Quite the pathetic reception!

... I'll gouge out your
contemptuous eyes.

Do you still fail to understand?
That you... are nothing but prey!

A soaking wet mutt, are you now?
Oh, does this not remind you of
the day I took your place?! HAHAHAHA!

Hmph, how dare you glorified
dishwashers bare your knives at me?

Catherine...?! It's me, Heathcliff...!
Please, embrace me once again!!!

It matters not what kind of Heathcliff you are!
I shall embrace every Catherine mine!!!

... You gave up your dream for the Family? 
You, who preached about your
dream with every breath...?
No... she is not like my sister.

You dare raise your blade against a higher Kindred? 
Punishment for your filial impiety awaits. 
... And for me as well, I suppose...

Those wounds... the Priest of this world
must be just as haunted by guilt.

I expect you to fight to your deaths in this
crucial struggle, reversible as they may be.
Unearth it.
It must lie there still, shrouded it may be.
Shall it remain buried still?
Demonstrate to me your will.
The mass of pain within your heart... is difficult to untangle.

Is it your companions who hold your tongue?
Then... perhaps they must be shaken afore
you are to speak your truth.
Do not fear the futility. There will be time for that once you have spoken your mind.
Rest awhile... until the clock turns.
Cut them Down, Mao.
Heed Me, Zilu.

Huh... y'all ain't half bad!
Keep makin' it worth my bullet fees!

dataList.desc: 뇌횡사용 시: 탄환 충분 - 강력한 스킬
dataList.dlg:
Eyes up here, boys!
Don'tcha go losin' yer heads now!

dataList.desc: 뇌횡사용 시: 탄환 부족 - 강력한 스킬
dataList.dlg: Hwell, what's this? Manageable so far?

I'maboutta drop somethin' big on y'all!
Don't let it kill y'all now and spoil the fun!

Aw heck, don't tell me
y'all are tuckered out already!

dataList.desc: 뇌횡턴 시작 : [체력 n% 이하]에 버프 획득
dataList.dlg:
That's more like it.
Y'all are firin' me up!

Y'all don't go on huntin' tigers without preparin'
yerselves to get chomped 'tween one of them jaws!

dataList.desc: 뇌횡턴 시작 : [체력 n% 이하]에 버프 변경
dataList.dlg:
Can't leave a dance unfinished.
Ain't that right?

Can't waste any more time on these...
... sickening, revolting insects.

Don’t pretend you’ve changed.
You’re still the same trash you were back then... scum!
... Is this also the E.G.O's power?

Behold! This contempt!
It rains down upon the disgusting filth!
Foolishness.

You have taken a glimpse of yesterday's spring.
A memory rarely availed to even myself.

Do not let your past ties ruin your judgment.
It makes me want to blast them all away.

Sacrifices are necessary
in pursuit of the greater cause.

dataList.desc: 구보체력 n% 미만 / 경멸 나선 모드 감상
dataList.dlg: ... Whew. That worked.
Fulfill your worth!
You dare!

Oh, revered Xianren! Shi Miyin brought the gem back!
The pretty gem that'll make Hongyuan all beautiful again…!

Blasphemous transgressors!
Outsiders shall not covet the treasure of Daguanyuan!

You favor me, don't you?
I knew you would, dear Xianhuang Worm!

All the wisdom of Hongyuan...
Give it to me, give it to Miyin...!
Be one with the fathomless history of Hongyuan!

dataList.desc: 가모턴 시작 : 지고한 불사 흐트러짐 실패
dataList.dlg:
We have transcended the yoke of life and death...
Thus, Hongyuan shall shine for all eternity as well!
Ahh... What a shameful failure of duties this is...
You will obey us!
With Love!
In the Name of Justice!
Arcana Beats!
Arcana Beats~!
Disappear~
In the name of Love and Justice~ Here comes Magical Girl!

dataList.desc: 절망의 기사 첫 흐트러짐 이후 검 소환 패턴에 진입했을 때
dataList.dlg: So you’ve been consumed too, senpai… Can this cycle really not be stopped?
Heed me, thou that are more azure than justice and more crimson than love…
In the name of those buried in destiny, I shall make this oath to the light.
ARCANA SLAVE!
You've... been suppressing it as much as you could...

dataList.desc: 완전 제압 X, 아르카나 슬레이브 발사 후
dataList.dlg: Huff, puff, puff... Did... did we get her?!
I swore I would... protect everyone... to the end…
Ow, that hurts!
"Couldn't you have dodged that, you oaf?!"

Oh!
"Blimey..."
We'll rip you up.
You were going to kill that time anyway.

We can't rip their time...?
"You bloody fool!"
"We've been had!"

We reap the dying hours.
"You've plenty o' time! Give it!"
"Let's sever 500... no, 2000 hours."
"Get a grip, you muppet!"

"Damn... let's end this."
"You're taking too much time from us...!"
The benefits will outweigh the costs. Calm down.

We have no choice but to use it.
"Make sure your arithmetics are correct. Equal hours from everyone!"
We'll... cut you up.
Shut— Shut up! We're infighting...! This is a waste of time!
I don't recall this candidate... Hm, all kinds of sorry churls seem to vie for the seat of the Hierarch in this place they call a mirror world.
This is no place for something so insignificant as family. You, who are causeless and hollow of vision toward Hongyuan, do not belong here.
Benighted is this fool. One need not coerce others to lay down their lives, for the pursuit of a great cause naturally begets those who would gladly brave death itself.
For all that disinclination toward violence, you seem to have a passing talent for it nonetheless. Even a pathetic craven becomes... a madman when swept up by the flow.
Behold the fool, the jester; he hollers empty skyward boasts, yet heaven remains just as unreachable.
Ha... ha ha! I shall always welcome another opportunity to cut down these ancient demons who have been seduced by immortality!
Keep twisting in that filth, Shi Miyin... It'll only enhance the taste of happiness, wrath, sorrow, and joy when I cleave into you!
I never thought I'd ever see you in Hongyuan again, big brother... Fuhu, so in this world, you managed to survive. You seem to be carving out your own path much like myself.

Phew... okay, fine. Then...
As the Lord of Hongyuan, I hereby grant you audience.

Avenging Jia Huan shouldn't affect you this much now, should it...? When did this revolting display of belated melodrama replace your advocacy for the cold and calculating pragmatism you had discussed before me?

dataList.desc: 말풍선 특수 대사_홍원 군주 홍루_가모 보옥탈출
dataList.dlg: Never did I let this sickening cradle imprison me, and that will not change today! Never!
Fascinating. Why was I not told that such interesting dialogues could be had with him in this world?

You assert that education of humanity and propriety is what cleanses the years of fell deeds? The first step seems to have eluded you: absolutely pulverize the fell deeds. Only then shall humanity and propriety have any significance.

Evil must be mercilessly wrested from their roots(除惡務盡 斬草除根). The path I have chosen as the Lord of Hongyuan is a path unburdened by the need to seek understanding from others. Thus, big brother—no, Jia Qiu, this dialogue has met an impasse.
